table.name: vtiger_modelandaggregates
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_modelandaggregates` ( `modelandaggregatesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `eq_sr_equip_model` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `masn_aggrregate` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`modelandaggregatesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_modelandaggregatescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_modelandaggregatescf` ( `modelandaggregatesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`modelandaggregatesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
